definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: He stamped on the sparks to deep the brush- fire from spreading.
sentences.chinese: 他踏灭火花，以免灌木林火蔓延开来。

sentences.english: The soil physical properties of the bush forestlands are better than barren slope obviously.
sentences.chinese: 四种灌木林地土壤的物理性状明显优于荒坡地。

sentences.english: The research shows that the aerial shrub species have strong component against disasters.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，飞播灌木林树种组成具有很强的抗灾性。

sentences.english: Eventually we got to our feet and ran across the North Lawn to the nearest copse of trees.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我们站了起来跑过北草坪到最近的灌木林里。

sentences.english: The hunter trailed the wounded buffalo through the bush.
sentences.chinese: 猎人穿过灌木林追猎受伤的水牛。

sentences.english: A thicket of small trees or shrubs ; a coppice.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，在一个美丽的小灌木林里布置了野餐。

definition: Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
